author: Sentinel Digital Desk
title: Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention hails ‘peace agreement’ with ULFA - Sentinelassam
text: Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention hails ‘peace agreement’ with ULFA The Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention (KRNC) welcomed the peace agreement on the way to be signed tomorrow between the government and the pro-talk ULFA faction. STAFF REPORTER GUWAHATI: The Koch-Rajbongshi National Convention (KRNC) welcomed the peace agreement on the way to be signed tomorrow between the government and the pro-talk ULFA faction. The organisation hopes that this peace agreement will ensure constitutional safeguards for the indigenous people of the state in their socio-economic, political, and educational aspects. In a statement, KRNC general secretary Biswajit Rai said, “A large number of indigenous people, including Koch-Rajbonghsis, had to lose their lives in the prolonged armed conflicts of the ULFA. The pro-talk faction of the [ULFA ](https://www.sentinelassam.com/topheadlines/assam-army-goc-in-c-lt-gen-rp-kalita-urges-paresh-barua-to-return-683365)talked to various ethnic communities in the state to prepare its charter of demands for the peace talks. They also had talks with the Koch-Rajbongshis. We hope that the peace agreement will be reflective of the hopes and aspirations of the indigenous people of the state.” Also read: [Assam: Army GOC-in-C Lt Gen R.P. Kalita urges Paresh Barua to Return](https://www.sentinelassam.com/topheadlines/assam-army-goc-in-c-lt-gen-rp-kalita-urges-paresh-barua-to-return-683365) Also Watch:

author: Ajit Singh
title: Best iPhone 14 wireless chargers you can buy
text:
One of the good things about the iPhone 14 is that it not only offers
wired fast charging but also wireless charging. It is compatible with Apple’s MagSafe and recently released Qi2 wireless charging. You can get up to 15W wireless charging speed with the right wireless charger.
This is twice as fast as standard Qi wireless charging. Check out these best iPhone 14 wireless chargers for the fastest wireless charging speeds. You can even pick the model that can charge multiple devices but you will have to settle for slow charging speeds then.
Anker MagGo Qi2 Wireless Charger
The Anker MagGo is a 15W Qi2 wireless charger. It comes with a 5ft/1.5m charging cable for better reach. The charger itself is made of aluminum alloy. Anker's ActiveShield 2.0 tech helps with temperature monitoring. Available in Black and White colors.
Anker MagGo 3-in-1 Qi2 Wireless Charging Stand
It is a Qi2 compatible wireless charging stand from Anker. It can be used to charge three devices simultaneously. It comes bundled with a 40W USB-C charging adapter and a 5ft/1.5m USB-C to USB-C cable. Choose from Black and White color.
Anker MagGo 3-in-1 Qi2 Wireless Charging Station
It is a wireless charging station for those who don't prefer a wireless charging stand. All other features are the same as the above-listed MagGo charging stand. Color options are the same i.e. Black and White.
Sale
Belkin BoostCharge Pro Qi2 Wireless Charger
This is Belkin's Qi2 wireless charger with 15W wireless charging speed. You can charge the iPhone in both landscape and horizontal orientations. Black and White color options are here too.
Apple MagSafe Charger
This is Apple's official MagSafe charge for iPhone. Its charging pad sticks to the back of the iPhone and offers the highest supported 15W wireless charging speed. It has a USB-C port and comes with an integrated 1m USB-C cable.
Sale
Apple MagSafe Duo
As the name suggests, MagSafe Duo lets you wirelessly charge two devices at the same time. It works with iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods. The best part is it can be folded which makes it portable while traveling.
Note: This article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
